clearAllCookies

public static void clearAllCookies(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                   javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
Clears all cookies by setting Cookie.setMaxAge(int) to 0;

Parameters:
request - Request to get cookies from, required.
response - Response to set updated cookies on, required.

getCookie

public static javax.servlet.http.Cookie getCookie(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                  java.lang.String name)
Finds a cookie by name and returns it if found.

Parameters:
request - Request to look for cookies on, required.
name - Name of cookies to look for, required.
Returns:
Cookie if found, otherwise null.

name - Name of cookies to look for, required.

Cookie if found, otherwise null.
